entry.tran: （歌声或说话声中的）颤音,震音
entry.def: If someone's singing or speaking voice has a tremolo in it, it moves up and down instead of staying on the same note.

means.word_mean: 1. (music) a tremulous effect produced by rapid repetition of a single tone or rapid alternation of two tones
2. vocal vibrato especially an excessive or poorly controlled one
